CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Beat calculation weights (X: bass level, Y: bass hits)
CONTROLS.NAME: bass_mix

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Beat response curve (X: bass level power, Y: bass hits power; higher = stronger)
CONTROLS.NAME: bass_pow

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Media opacity – fade visuals in or out
CONTROLS.NAME: media_opacity

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Camera look direction offset (X: horizontal, Y: vertical)
CONTROLS.NAME: camera_direction

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Base camera position offsets (X and Y: position)
CONTROLS.NAME: camera_pos

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Base hue offset for all scene colors
CONTROLS.NAME: base_hue

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Tomb visibility threshold – higher values show fewer tombs
CONTROLS.NAME: tomb_probability

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Ring texture pattern direction (X and Y form normalized vector)
CONTROLS.NAME: ring_direction

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Light source direction for shading (X and Y angles)
CONTROLS.NAME: light_direction

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Audio threshold for ring visualization – filters quiet frequencies
CONTROLS.NAME: fft_limit

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Hue for vignette color burn effect
CONTROLS.NAME: color_burn_hue

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Saturation for vignette color burn effect
CONTROLS.NAME: color_burn_saturation

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Intensity for vignette color burn effect
CONTROLS.NAME: color_burn_intensity

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Gas giant planet position (X: horizontal, Y: vertical)
CONTROLS.NAME: gas_giant_position

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Frame blending amount – higher creates motion blur trail
CONTROLS.NAME: motion_blur

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Camera field of view – higher is wider angle
CONTROLS.NAME: fov
